item.biomancy.mob_fang.tooltip: Cutting tooth made of tissue rich in minerals.
item.biomancy.mob_claw.tooltip: Hardened Claw made of tough fibers and rich in minerals.
item.biomancy.mob_marrow.tooltip: Marrow extracted from the bones of your victims. Rich in Hormones and minerals.
item.biomancy.withered_mob_marrow.toolti:
Withered Marrow, some dark fluid is oozing out of it.
It looks tasty, maybe you should suck it dry...
item.biomancy.mob_gland.tooltip: A sac filled to the brim with bile.
item.biomancy.toxin_gland.tooltip: An organ full of toxins, maybe you should drink it...
item.biomancy.volatile_gland.tooltip:
A gland filled with an extremely reactive fluid.
Doesn't seem like it's poisonous... Might be worth drinking.
item.biomancy.flesh_bits.tooltip: A tiny bit of flesh... Used as a primary crafting ingredient.
item.biomancy.bone_fragments.tooltip: A tiny fragment of bone. Provides rigidity and shape to flesh. Useful for assembling mechanical parts.
item.biomancy.tough_fibers.tooltip: Fibrous tissue that is very tough and rigid. Useful for crafting things that need more resilience.
item.biomancy.elastic_fibers.tooltip: Fibrous tissue that is sturdy, while still being flexible and stretchy. It appears to be a good material to imitate muscles.
item.biomancy.mineral_fragment.tooltip:
Component only obtained in Decomposer.
Used to toughen and harden fibers.
item.biomancy.gem_fragments.tooltip:
Bedazzle your fleshy creations!
Used to enhance hardened fibers to their maximum resilience, but they're very expensive.
item.biomancy.bio_lumens.tooltip:
A basic component only obtained via the Decomposer, usually alongside biotic matter.

Used as a cosmetic upgrade to make things glow.
item.biomancy.organic_matter.tooltip: Moist organic material, extracted from plants. With its dark and fibrous texture, it almost seems like humus.
item.biomancy.exotic_dust.tooltip:
Exotic substance, perhaps the very essence of magic itself.
An uncommon byproduct obtained by decomposing magical things.
item.biomancy.stone_powder.tooltip: A very basic crafting component, usually obtained as a byproduct from decomposing things.
item.biomancy.nutrients.tooltip: Very hard pellets rich in energy that almost look like vitamin pills.
item.biomancy.nutrient_paste.tooltip:
Nutrients combined with Biotic Matter to moisten the hard pellets, producing a paste.
It almost looks like yellowish cake, and is a convenient source of energy.
item.biomancy.nutrient_bar.tooltip: Nutrient Paste compressed into the shape of a bar. Looks edible, if a bit bland.
item.biomancy.bloomberry.tooltip: An exotic delicacy which has a bioluminescent sheen and grants random potion effects when eaten.
item.biomancy.regenerative_fluid.tooltip: A fluid with regenerative properties, used to concoct healing additives.
item.biomancy.withering_ooze.tooltip: A corrosive extract. It likely has uses in bio-alchemy.
item.biomancy.hormone_secretion.tooltip: A fluid extract very rich in various hormones. A potent material for making drugs.
item.biomancy.toxin_extract.tooltip: A fluid so toxic you probably shouldn't touch it. Good for making a plethora of dubious substances.
item.biomancy.volatile_fluid.tooltip: A very combustible extract, however it needs further processing to be truly dangerous.
item.biomancy.bile.tooltip: Organic base material which is often used in bio-alchemy.
item.biomancy.despoil_sickle.tooltip:
A very brittle yet highly specialized tool for pillaging special loot from dying mobs.

When held in either hand, the tool guarantees Despoil loot drops. When doing so, it receives extra durability damage.
item.biomancy.vial.tooltip:
A small organic container with very high alchemical resistance, perfect for holding reactive substances.
The vial dissolves on use.
item.biomancy.living_flesh.tooltip:
It's alive!
Unfortunately, it looks too dumb to be the brain of a mob. You should turn it into a construct instead.
item.biomancy.primordial_core.tooltip: A ominous artifact made of flesh. Looking at it makes you feel uneasy...
item.biomancy.creator_mix.tooltip: A meal made for the cradle... not for you.
item.biomancy.injector.tooltip:
A simple device which utilizes a razor sharp needle to quickly and forcefully inject Serums into Mobs and Players.

Can be enchanted with:
 - Piercing: Increases the chance to pierce through armor
 - Anesthetic Touch: Nullifies the damage from the needle
item.biomancy.fertilizer.tooltip: Fertilizer that induces hyper-growth in plants, even for reeds, cactus, nether wart and chorus.
item.biomancy.gift_sac.tooltip:
Looks like some objects are wrapped in an organic layer of skin. Might be filled with items or toxin if your language is set to German.

Right Click the Sac to retrieve the Items.
item.biomancy.ravenous_claws.tooltip:
Extremely hungry and vicious Claws forged by starving living flesh and grafting claws onto it.

Repair the famished claws by feeding them with food via the player inventory, as you would fill a bundle.

Killing Mobs with these claws grants blood charges, which allow you to use the Awakened mode.
item.biomancy.bile_spitter.tooltip:
[WIP] "living" projectile weapon that shoots corrosive bile.
Intended behaviour: charge it like a bow to increase damageShape & size of projectile.
item.biomancy.organic_compound.tooltip: Slimy substance made of bile infused with nutrients.
item.biomancy.unstable_compound.tooltip: Very unstable and reactive substance. Seems like it will combust if it comes in contact with just about anything else.
item.biomancy.exotic_compound.tooltip: Substance of a questionable nature, comprised of exotic material and other trace elements.
item.biomancy.genetic_compound.tooltip: Cocktail of various hormones, nutrients and organic elements. It seems useful for producing potent stimulants.
item.biomancy.corrosive_additive.tooltip: A highly corrosive fluid that seems useful for alchemically burning away organic material, or weakening the bonds of complex substances.
item.biomancy.healing_additive.tooltip: An highly concentrated substance that is used to imbue its properties to other compounds.
serum.biomancy.ageing_serum.tooltip: Forces the maturation of young Mobs into Adults. Some rare Mobs may even turn into Elders.
serum.biomancy.rejuvenation_serum.toolti: Reverses the maturation of Mobs, in most cases turning them into children.
serum.biomancy.enlargement_serum.tooltip:
Induces growth in Slimes, Magma Cubes and Flesh Blobs.

(If Pehkui is installed you can enlarge yourself and all Mobs)
serum.biomancy.shrinking_serum.tooltip:
Shrinks Slimes, Magma Cubes and Flesh Blobs.

(If Pehkui is installed you can shrink yourself and all Mobs)
serum.biomancy.cleansing_serum.tooltip:
Burns away all foreign substances inside a creature.
Very effective on sticky status effects that refuse to be healed with milk.
serum.biomancy.breeding_stimulant.toolti: Makes Animals hyper-fertile, making them able to repeatedly reproduce for a short time.
serum.biomancy.absorption_boost.tooltip: Grants stackable absorption health points to Mobs and Players.
serum.biomancy.insomnia_cure.tooltip:
Resets the last slept time, no need to sleep for quite some time.
Coffee who?
item.biomancy.primordial_hungry_flesh_bl: Primordial Hungry Flesh Blob Spawn Egg
block.biomancy.primordial_cradle.tooltip: Offer adequate Tributes to the cradle and summon forth primordial messengers of exquisite flesh.
block.biomancy.decomposer.tooltip:
A bio-machine that deconstructs items into their base components.
The Decomposer consumes nutrients to function.
block.biomancy.digester.tooltip: A machine born from flesh that converts food and plants into extremely bio-available nutrients.
block.biomancy.tongue.tooltip: Extracts up to 3 items of the same type every 24 ticks from containers it's attached to, and drops them on the ground.
block.biomancy.maw_hopper.tooltip: A fleshy sister of the hopper. Transfers up to 16 items at a time.
block.biomancy.storage_sac.tooltip: Cheap Shulker-like storage sac that also acts like a bundle.
block.biomancy.fleshkin_chest.tooltip:
Crafted from living flesh, the organic composition of the chest grants it remarkable resilience, ensuring the safety of its precious contents even from explosions.

Only its true master can unlock its contents without invoking the wrath of its razor-sharp fangs.
block.biomancy.fleshkin_pressure_plate.t:
Fleshkin pancake. Yummy...
It has two behaviors, either it only activates for its owner or it only works for everyone else.

Sneak click to change its behavior.
block.biomancy.flesh.tooltip: A generic block of flesh... Don't bother me with this!
block.biomancy.flesh_slab.tooltip: A generic slab of flesh... Don't bother me with this!
block.biomancy.flesh_stairs.tooltip: Stairs made of generic flesh... Don't bother me with this!
block.biomancy.packed_flesh.tooltip: Tenacious Block of flesh. Is it tough enough?
block.biomancy.packed_flesh_slab.tooltip: Tenacious Slab of flesh. Is it tough enough?
block.biomancy.packed_flesh_stairs.toolt: Stairs made of tenacious flesh. Is it tough enough?
block.biomancy.flesh_pillar.tooltip: A Pillar made of bones and flesh.
block.biomancy.fibrous_flesh.tooltip: A unusual block flesh made from the innards of someone.
block.biomancy.chiseled_flesh.tooltip: A regal block of flesh... I'm most delighted
block.biomancy.ornate_flesh.tooltip: A set of regal teeth and flesh.
block.biomancy.flesh_fence.tooltip: Fence made of bones and flesh...
block.biomancy.flesh_fence_gate.tooltip: Fence gate made of bones and flesh...
block.biomancy.flesh_iris_door.tooltip: Trapdoor-like iris door made of flesh...
block.biomancy.flesh_door.tooltip: A sliding door made of flesh...
block.biomancy.full_flesh_door.tooltip: A wide sliding door made of flesh...
block.biomancy.flesh_spike.tooltip:
A deadly trap fashioned from the amalgamation of reinforced bone and sinew. Approach with caution, for any contact will inflict considerable harm.

Multiple spikes can be meticulously placed within a single location, intensifying their lethality.
block.biomancy.flesh_ladder.tooltip: Ladder mainly made of bones and a little bit of flesh...
block.biomancy.bio_lantern_yellow.toolti: A bioluminescent light source that is energy-efficient and environmentally friendly.
block.biomancy.bio_lantern_blue.tooltip: A bioluminescent light source. This one is blue!
block.biomancy.primordial_bio_lantern.to: A magenta light source made from a bioluminescent berry.
block.biomancy.bloomlight.tooltip: A malignant light source. This one is magenta as well!
block.biomancy.impermeable_membrane.tool: Gelatinous-like membrane reinforced with elastic fibers.
block.biomancy.baby_permeable_membrane.t:
Gelatinous-like membrane reinforced with elastic fibers.

Baby mobs can diffuse through the membrane.
Gelatinous-like membrane reinforced with elastic fibers.

Adult mobs can diffuse through the membrane.
block.biomancy.primal_permeable_membrane:
Gelatinous-like membrane reinforced with elastic fibers.

Only mobs that are alive can diffuse through the membrane.
block.biomancy.undead_permeable_membrane:
Gelatinous-like membrane reinforced with elastic fibers.

Only mobs that are undead can diffuse through the membrane.
block.biomancy.primal_flesh.tooltip: Primitive and pure, you better not touch this with your dirty mitts.
block.biomancy.primal_flesh_slab.tooltip: Primitive and pure, you better not touch this with your dirty mitts.
block.biomancy.primal_flesh_stairs.toolt:
Stairs made of primal flesh.
Feels primitive and pure...
block.biomancy.primal_flesh_wall.tooltip:
Wall of primal flesh. Is this Terraria?
You better start running >:D
block.biomancy.malignant_flesh.tooltip: Looks dangerous, you better not touch it!
block.biomancy.malignant_flesh_slab.tool: Looks off-putting, probably best not to touch it.
block.biomancy.malignant_flesh_stairs.to:
Stairs made of malignant flesh.
Looks diseased...
block.biomancy.malignant_flesh_wall.tool:
Wall of malignant flesh.
It's coming for you! ;)
block.biomancy.malignant_flesh_veins.too:
They look almost feral...
you better not touch them.
block.biomancy.primal_bloom.tooltip:
An exotic flower of primordial beauty.

It will spread itself by launching it's ripe berry into the air.
On impact the berry explodes and spreads malignant veins as well.
block.biomancy.primal_orifice.tooltip: A primitive piece full of holes. It seems to leak an acidic substance.
enchantment.biomancy.despoil.desc: When killing something with a weapon that has this enchantment, they will drop additional special loot.
enchantment.biomancy.anesthetic.desc: Prevents the Damage & Aggro caused by injecting mobs with the Injector. Mobs won't know who attacked them, and animals won't panic anymore.
death.attack.biomancy.chest_bite: %1$s tried opening a chest, but was eaten instead
death.attack.biomancy.spike_impale: %1$s was skewered by a sharp spike
death.attack.biomancy.tooth_projectile: [WIP] %1$s was forcefully implanted with teeth by %2$s
death.attack.biomancy.tooth_projectile.i: [WIP] %1$s received a lethal dental implant by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.biomancy.corrosive_acid_pro: [WIP] %1$s was doused with corrosive acid by %2$s
[WIP] %1$s was showered in corrosive acid by %2$s using %3$s
tooltip.biomancy.ability.bleed_proc.desc: When triggered, adds one Bleed Stack (max 2)
tooltip.biomancy.ability.blood_explosion: On Bleed Stack, deals 10% of max health as damage
tooltip.biomancy.ability.shredding_strik: On heavy attack, adds one Armor Shred stack (max 20)
On critical hit, applies Corrosive status effect
advancements.biomancy.root.title: Meat Whisperer
advancements.biomancy.root.description: You feel a presence in the flesh, it whispers into your ears: "Raw Meat is useful..."
advancements.biomancy.flesh.title: Primal Vision
advancements.biomancy.flesh.description: You feel an ancient presence from the ender pearl. As you gaze into the pearl... portals... you feel compelled to combine it with raw meat... cross the boundary...
advancements.biomancy.greedy_butcher.des: You've acquired a taste for organs. Craft the plundering Sickle to get them fresh from your victims death.
advancements.biomancy.organ_trader.title: Organ Trader
advancements.biomancy.organ_trader.descr: Become the funnel for fleshy parts and trade various organs with villagers.
advancements.biomancy.poacher.title: Rare Animal Poacher
advancements.biomancy.poacher.descriptio: You have no morals and poached endangered Animals.
advancements.biomancy.predator_killer.de: Hunt predators and collect their fangs and claws.
advancements.biomancy.cat_killer.title: Kitty Cat Killer
advancements.biomancy.cradle.title: Cradle of Life
advancements.biomancy.cradle.description: The Primordial Core is whispering of a bowl filled with life... build the flesh construct and feed it with organic materials.
advancements.biomancy.healing_activator_: It's seems like fluids enriched in life energy are needed. Jumpstart the process with a few healing potions.
advancements.biomancy.raw_meat_sacrifice: Serve raw meat to the Primordial Cradle.
advancements.biomancy.cooked_meat_sacrif: Serve cooked meat to the Primordial Cradle.
advancements.biomancy.decomposer.title: Munch & Crunch
advancements.biomancy.decomposer.descrip: You suddenly feel disgusted by the composter. You should use a semi-living construct to decompose things into their base parts.
advancements.biomancy.bio_forge.title: Organic Smithing
advancements.biomancy.bio_forge.descript: You dreamt of a Bio-Construct weaving organic parts together into intricate semi-living things... You don't know when, but you built it.
advancements.biomancy.digester.title: Yummy Paste
advancements.biomancy.digester.descripti: You feel tired of feeding your Bio-Constructs with poor quality food. You have the urge to produce a nutrients enriched yellow-green paste.
advancements.biomancy.bio_lab.title: Is this still Alchemy?
advancements.biomancy.bio_lab.descriptio: You had an epiphany, why use crude inorganic tools to brew potions if an Bio-Construct can do it better. No longer do you need to mix or adjust the heat by yourself.
advancements.biomancy.bio_injector.title: Injections
advancements.biomancy.bio_injector.descr: Craft a Injector to be able to forcefully inject Serums into all living things.
Combine various organic secretions and substances to create Compounds and Serums.
advancements.biomancy.exotic_compounds.d: Combine organic things with exotic compounds to create cures and cleansing fluids.
Combine organic things with genetic compounds to create fluids that influence growth and fertility.
book.biomancy.guide_book.name: Biomancy Index
book.biomancy.guide_book.tooltip: A book to test Modonomicon features for Biomancy.
book.biomancy.guide_book.features.primor: By filling the cradle with raw flesh and a healing agent (Instant Health Potions, Healing Additive, or Regenerative Fluid) you gain the ability to form new living beings
book.biomancy.guide_book.features.spotli: [PH] Spotlight pages allow to show items (actually, ingredients).
[PH] A sample spotlight page with custom title.
[PH] A sample spotlight page with automatic title.
book.biomancy.guide_book.features.mob.li:
Living Flesh is the remains of a Flesh Blob after is has been killed.
\
It's most definitely alive, although it lacks any real intelligence or selfish will.
\
++That isn't necessarily a bad thing though...++
book.biomancy.guide_book.features.mob.fl:
A regular Flesh Blob is formed with just typical raw meat and healing agents.
\
Has no redeeming qualities, but makes for a good house pet.
book.biomancy.guide_book.features.mob.hu:
A Hungry Flesh Blob is formed by adding a few Sharp Fangs into the cradle with some raw meat and a healing agent.
\
Maybe don't try petting this one...
book.biomancy.guide_book.features.decomp: By giving a Living Flesh some more meat, a few Sharp Fangs, and a Bile Gland, you make a creature that will chew up items and give you useful components for the Bio-Forge
book.biomancy.guide_book.features.name: Fleshy Constructs
